      • add

        @NotNull(message="adjustment ID is never NULL")
String add(@NotNull(message="engagement ref can\'t be NULL")
                        String engagement,
                        @NotNull(message="charge amount can\'t be NULL")
                        BigDecimal charge,
                        @NotNull(message="comments can\'t be NULL")
                        String comments,
                        @NotNull(message="notes can\'t be NULL")
                        String notes)
           throws IOException
        Make a custom/bonus payment.
        Parameters:
        engagement - Engagement reference number
        charge - Amount to be charged from the payer (can be zero)
        comments - Payment comments
        notes - Notes to add to the payment
        Returns:
        Reference ID of a new adjustment
        Throws:
        IOException - If fails due to IO problem
        Since:
        0.7
        See Also:
        Custom Payment API
        Suppressed Checkstyle violations:
        ParameterNumber (10 lines)
